name: OCKCarePlanStoreDelegate
desc: An object that receives change callbacks from care plan stores.

items.name: func carePlanStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyCarePlanStore, didAddCarePlans: [OCKAnyCarePlan])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you add care plans to the store.

items.name: func carePlanStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyCarePlanStore, didUpdateCarePlans: [OCKAnyCarePlan])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you update care plans in the store.

items.name: func carePlanStore(OCKAnyReadOnlyCarePlanStore, didDeleteCarePlans: [OCKAnyCarePlan])
items.desc: Notifies the delegate when you delete care plans from the store.
